description: When they get nervous, Matt Mortensen and Jayson Terdiman think about a waterfall: Nothing can interrupt it. They look at the track; then they hear the lyrics of a rap song: “It’s crunch time.”
title: How to Conquer the Doubles Luge
title_page: How to Conquer the Doubles Luge - Video - NYTimes.com
text: Imagine that you’re an Olympic athlete about to compete. How do you calm your nerves? In this series, we take you inside the minds of current and former Olympians as they visualize their dream performance.
